abstract: Rio Tinto, the target of a hostile bid from rival miner BHP Billiton, filed for an initial public offering of its North American coal business on Friday but said it is still considering other options.
lead_paragraph: Rio Tinto, the target of a hostile bid from rival miner BHP Billiton, filed for an initial public offering of its North American coal business on Friday but said it is still considering other options.

headline.main: Rio Tinto Unit Files to Sell Shares
